member.name: T:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaPlayerXT
member.summary: Main class for iOS MediaPlayer plugin. High-level API.

member.name: M:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaPlayerXT.PlayStreamingFullscreenMovie(System.String,System.Boolean,U3DXT.iOS.Native.MediaPlayer.MPMovieControlStyle)
member.param: If set to true auto play.

member.name: T:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaExporter
member.summary: High-level class to export media to storage.

member.name: E:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaExporter.ExportCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when an export operation has completed.

member.name: E:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaExporter.ExportFailed
member.summary: Occurs when an export operation has failed.

member.name: M:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaExporter.ExportAudio(U3DXT.iOS.Native.MediaPlayer.MPMediaItem,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports the audio of a media item to storage.
member.returns: true if audio started exporting, false if it is exporting another audio or the media item has DRM.
member.param: Absolute output folder or specify null to use Documents folder.
Output file name or specify null to use [artist] - [title].[extension].
Whether to overwrite the output file.

member.name: M:U3DXT.iOS.MediaPlayer.MediaExportedEventArgs.#ctor(System.String)
